name: THE MATRIX: INFINITE
description:
Play the The Matrix: Infinite in this Interactive fiction.

Made for the $1,000 JTAGame Jam #1
Theme:No Violence

In This Game You Play As a Employee who Work in The Backrooms Of Matrix (simulation) ..    

  •  Go along with the story
  • Explore!
  • Complete all the task (total of 6 task)

----------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

>  WASD or arrow keys to move

>  Click to Use

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS :

  • Windows 7 or above
  • 4GB Ram or above
  • 32 bit 
  • Works on any Low-End PC

--------------------------------------------

CREDITS:

  •   All asset except Sound : SpaceCarrot (ME)    
  •   Sound: Royalty-free sounds (PixaBay.Com)

SOFTWARES USED:

  • Unity engine 5.5
  • Art : PyxelEdit
  • Sfx: sfxr &  BoscaCeoil

              PLAY AND ENJOY!
